item.description:
Hi Everyone,
It seems that my last email wasn't received (or somehow wasn't sent!), so here it is again. If this is the first time you are getting this, it will be last minute notice, but here it is.
On Thursday, July 17, at 7:30pm we will be having our monthly meditation class. It is a great class for people who want to begin to learn to meditate, and also for those who have tried it and are interested in finding out how to meditate as a way of connecting to God inside. All are welcome!

In peace,
Rev. Johanna

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Meditation Class
